tool_description: converts from decimal to Roman numbering without complications with this api
name: Decimal To Roman Number Converter
title: Decimal To Roman Number Converter

api_list.name: decimal-number-to-roman-number/:number
api_list.description: decimal number to roman number (only value <= 99999)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://decimal-to-roman-number-converter.p.rapidapi.com/decimal-number-to-roman-number/25878"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "decimal-to-roman-number-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://decimal-to-roman-number-converter.p.rapidapi.com/decimal-number-to-roman-number/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "decimal-to-roman-number-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
